# f5xc_cloud_credentials (Data Source)

Fetches information about existing Cloud Credentials in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Cloud Credentials to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Cloud Credentials exist.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the Cloud Credentials.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the Cloud Credentials.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels applied to the Cloud Credentials.
